tweet.text: RT @FSIatState: Meet Consul Hunt, the longest serving African American consul in Europe at the time. Representing a neutral nation, he acqu…
tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: Meet Consul Hunt, the longest serving African American consul in Europe at the time. Representing a neutral nation, he acquired responsibility for German, Austro-Hungarian, & Turkish subjects, visiting POW camps. Learn about WWI #HeroesofUSDiplomacy here: go.usa.gov/xp3FN. pic.twitter.com/fAKMfMsh0Q
